review:
i really appreciate ajay devang for awesome performance in this movie. this is not only a movie but more than that.
songs: woh ladki bahooth yaad ati hai both male, female and also a sad version.
haad se bhi zyaada tum kisise pyaar nahi karna... what a songs... ğŸ’—ğŸ’—ğŸ’—ğŸ’—ğŸ’—ğŸ’
i like ajay devang entry when he is released from jail having full lengthy hairs with woh ladki bahooth yaad ati song in background with sad version.. 
it's a story of betray in friendship. all his friends cheat him and ajay after stealing few rupees goes to jail while his girlfriend neha dhupia dies in front of him and ajay loses his state of mind. but she is saved by someone which we come to know later. 
but he gains when he sees his enimies sanjay kapoor and arbaaz khan.. 
the end is epic both ajay and neha reunite and the end.
03 /06 /19....

it's a great movie, that should be ranked as one of devgan's classic is. should have been rated above 7.5. the comic element in a fabric of nationalism through which peeps the serene light of love, has given it a special touch. from any angle the movie is a success in terms of artistry.

thank you.

on of great movie of aj.. all time superb  song!! top action scene by ajay at that time!!..love story along with nationalism!!

it's such a tragic to see it rated 4.8 out of 10. very sorry to say but the one who has rated it has really been poor in assessing the movie. it's a wonderful movie! rather the best of ajay devgn!
